title: Apple, Amazon, Lucid, Chevron: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Apple and Amazon shares slip premarket after their earnings reports; Electric-car maker Lucid’s shares extend Thursday’s gains
body:
Stock futures are slipping after some major post-market earnings reports Thursday afternoon pointed to risks from supply logjams and difficulty finding workers. Here’s what we’re watching ahead of Friday’s opening bell.
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
